group_1.textRight: Now, while they're getting the boat ready,@why don't we take a look around the stalls?

group_1.textLeft: I wanna meet with Shizuka and the others,@but do you think they're still busy?

group_1.textRight: Yes, there's that discussion about the Diviners@they said they'd be hosting...

group_1.textLeft: ...Hey, maybe they're in that crowd?
Alright, there's Shizuka and the others...

group_1.textRight: Oh my...something seems strange.

group_1.textLeft: I see...Miyo, was it?
I'm sorry, but I can't keep up with what@you're saying...

group_1.textRight: I need you to convince the village elder,@as Diviners!

group_1.textLeft: Even if we are Diviners...
...I think you'd be better off talking to@the elder yourself?

group_1.textRight: I already tried, and it didn't work!@That's why I'm asking you!

group_1.textLeft: Ah...! P-please calm down...

group_1.textRight: What's going on here?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Miss Togame...! And Miss Yakumo, too!

group_1.textRight: There appears to be some@sort of commotion...

group_1.textLeft: You see...this girl wants us to speak@with the village elder.
But I don't really understand@what it's about...

group_1.textRight: Well...we're distracting everybody at the festival.@Let's head over to the meeting hall so we can talk.

group_1.textLeft: ...Okay.
You mean you guys have a@"no romance with outsiders" rule?!

group_1.textRight: They say it's forbidden until@you come of age...
It's also said that the Diviner@in the legend...
...was punished for breaking@this custom.

group_1.textLeft: From what I gather, it was originally@a custom...
...designed to prevent girls from abandoning@their roles as Diviners.

group_1.textRight: In the Tokime village, we had no such@tradition...
But perhaps the adolescents here were forbidden@from falling in love with outsiders...
...to prevent those with the potential of becoming Diviners from leaving the village.

group_1.textLeft: If they broke the rules, they believed@they would be punished by the gods.
In that case, they had no choice@but to obey...

group_1.textRight: But the notion of divine retribution@is a total myth.
Nothing happened to me just@because I had a crush...

group_1.textLeft: Are you saying you're in love@with an outsider, Miyo?

group_1.textRight: [chara:800200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Mm?!
...Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: And you can't just let it go that easily,@even with that custom in place...

group_1.textRight: When I spoke to the elder,@he didn't listen to me at all.
So I thought that if you guys, as Diviners,@could censure the rule,
maybe the elder would reconsider...

group_1.textLeft: So that's what this is about...

group_1.textRight: All I want to do is love him...@Why are they getting in the way...? *Sniff*

group_1.textCenter: A Diviner is one who makes her wish for the village...@For the sake of the Land of the Rising Sun...
I know I mustn't make a wish for@my benefit alone, but...
I simply can't bear the thought of being@unable to share my feelings with him...
It's selfish of me to want to tell him@how I feel...
(I remember in my dream, there was@a girl who was struggling with love...)

group_2.textLeft: Nobody's got the right to interfere@with you, Miyo.
Cause it's not normal to think that@the gods'll punish you...
...just because you fall in love with@someone from elsewhere.
What...? You think you're one to talk?

group_2.textRight: I didn't say you were wrong, though.
We think quite similarly in this regard.

group_2.textCenter: Ah, you've returned...@We've arranged for the boat.
...Hm? What are you doing here, Miyo?

group_2.textLeft: I was talking with Momoko and the others@about our custom.
But Momoko said she'd support me...!

group_2.textRight: I don't know what you've been told, but@understand that our village has its own rules.

group_2.textLeft: To me...it's wrong that a tradition made@to protect people...
...winds up trampling all over their feelings@instead.
So I'm with Miyo on this.

group_2.textRight: ...I think it's about time you leave.

group_2.textLeft: Sir, please wait...!@We should talk about this―

group_2.textRight: This is a matter that should be@settled by the village.
